body.name: Zulay Kitchen Premium Garlic Press Set - Rust Proof & Dishwasher Safe Professional Garlic Mincer Tool - Easy-Squeeze, Easy-Clean with Soft, Ergonomic Handle - Silicone Garlic Peeler & Brush (Silver)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 21 hrs 50 mins
features: SIMPLE TO USE & BUILT TO LAST: Our premium quality garlic press is constructed from food-grade, rust-resistant materials meant to be among your favorite kitchen gadgets for years to come. This garlic and ginger mincer is designed with built-in studs to extract more paste within seconds. It is great for both professional and home kitchens.

CRUSH AND MINCE UNPEELED CLOVES: No more strong garlic odor or sticky residue lingering on your hands! Our garlic mincer is designed with a comfortable ergonomic handle that requires minimal effort on your wrists and hands to peel, crush, and mince the cloves in one go; yielding delicious garlic paste while the peels stay in the chamber.

EASY TO CLEAN: Simply rinse your garlic and ginger press tool under running water or place it in the dishwasher for thorough cleaning. We recommend rinsing the garlic crusher right after use to avoid residual pulp and fibers hardening up.

MULTI-PURPOSE TOOL: Don’t have a mortar and pestle? Fill the garlic mincer tool with coriander seeds, cumin seeds, or peppercorns when any recipe calls for “freshly cracked” or “coarsely ground” seeds. This garlic presser can also be used as a ginger press tool or to crush onions or nuts. Simply fill the chamber and squeeze to crush. PROP 65 WARNING: This product may contain chemical(s) known to the State of California to cause cancer, birth defects and/or other reproductive harm.

HASSLE-FREE, ZULAY GUARANTEE: We love and take pride in our ginger and garlic press and back this up with a lifetime warranty. We offer an incredible value at a moderate price and are confident that you'll love our garlic grinder!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effortless Garlic Prep: Zulay Kitchen Press Set Simplifies Cooking
reviews.reviewText: The Zulay Kitchen Premium Garlic Press Set has become an indispensable tool in my kitchen. This 3-piece garlic mincer kit is a game-changer for anyone who loves the flavor of fresh garlic but dislikes the tedious peeling and crushing process.What immediately caught my attention was the ergonomic design of the garlic press. The soft, easy-squeeze handle makes mincing garlic a breeze, reducing the effort needed to extract every bit of flavor from the cloves. Plus, the silicone garlic peeler included in the set is an absolute gem. It effortlessly removes the skin, saving time and frustration.The sturdy build of the garlic crusher ensures durability and reliability, even with consistent use. The cleaning brush included is another thoughtful addition, making cleanup a cinch.The garlic peeling sleeve is a standout feature. It simplifies one of the most tiresome kitchen tasks by efficiently peeling garlic cloves, saving both time and effort.In conclusion, the Zulay Kitchen Premium Garlic Press Set has revolutionized my garlic prep routine. It's a must-have for any home cook or garlic enthusiast. With its ergonomic design, practical additions, and easy cleanup, this set is an essential tool that enhances the cooking experience. Highly recommended for anyone looking to simplify their garlic preparation effortlessly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Use
reviews.reviewText: I'm a beginner cook, and love to cook with garlic. However, I didn't like the peeling and dicing. This product is sturdy, easy to use, easy to clean and a real time saver for me. I'm ordering another one for my SIL who is a good Italian cook. At first, I had my doubts about that the sleeve that peels it, but it works like a dream. If you like to cook with garlic, this an essential kitchen tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and clean
reviews.reviewText: This garlic press is well constructed and feels sturdy in your hand. It minces garlic as expected. It is easy to clean with dish soap and water. Comes with a brush for scraping off all the garlic and to help clean the holes. The rubber peeler is great too- just a bit of light pressure as you roll a clove inside the sleeve and the skin comes right off. Very satisfied with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good little garlic press.
reviews.reviewText: I like the product and it works well, but not perfect. It's made well and comfortable to use for home use. My only comment has to do with the upper press part. It is a little small for the lower bowl, and so although you do get most of the garlic going through the small holes, as it is meant to do, there is some that oozes up the sides around the presser. It's just a matter of then pushing it back down and putting it through again. Not a big deal, but leads to giving the product a 4. Overall a good product and it's getting lots of use. Much easier and less messy than doing garlic with a knife or grater. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product that is built with high quality materials, functions exactly as it should, and is easy and efficient to use for mincing garlic or onions. The bonus of the garlic peeler was great as I had never used one, but it worked much faster than peeling by hand.I would recommend this product over others listed on amazon as I felt I received what was described and got it at a great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great garlic press!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use and clean, sleek design and feels good in hand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, can utilize the entire clove. No waste
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I ordered the bronze garlic press, and it is absolutely beautiful! I have tried it only a couple of times so far, but I like it.I used to own the OXO brand earlier, can't remember why I don't have it anymore. That one is definitely good too, but I like this one better. For one, I can squeeze the garlic through with far less pressure, so it's easier on my hands. I can't imagine how hard it would have been if I had had actual arthritis, ouch! The OXO one has a larger cup and can hold two or three cloves, it also let's you twist it backward to push out the leftovers. But I did not like how it left the outer portions of the cloves still in the cup, unable to push them through at all because of the flat pusher, wasting it. So after you peel away the dry outer shells that must go, the rest of the clove is edible and there's no need to remove more. So now that I'm tired of mincing garlic with a knife and wanted to order another press, I decided to go with one that allows you to use the whole clove. The little bumps on the Zulay cut the clove as it forces it through the holes.The downside is that it's a little harder to clean it since some leftovers stick to the little bumps, but a brush takes it right off. I also was able to rub it off with my fingers under running water. I wouldn't say it's easy to clean, but it isn't hard either.One positive with the OXO is also that you can put a completely unpeeled clove in the cup and give it a squeeze, then peel off the dry skins easily. The Zulay has the tags on it but I tried it anyway, and it worked pretty well. It cuts into the clove a bit so you can't do it too hard, or tiny fragments of the dry skin will get stuck in the tiny indentations you just made in the clove. But they're so tiny it won't matter at all & don't think. I'll experiment on how hard to squeeze to do the trick without much residue.In the reviews some people don't like how some of the garlic squeezes up and out of it, and I too foud that this does happen to a small degree. But I just push it back in and give another squeeze to press this out as well. You can even see it happening in their own video of their product, but I think the press is designed that way. Not that they're intentionally wanting garlic to squeeze out the top, but the little pusher has some room around it and I'm guessing it's necessary for it to have a small amount of wiggle room to move freely into the cup without hitting the sides. Probably they'd receive complaints if that happened, right? So there's a little bit of wiggle room to make it work smoothly, and as a result a small amount of garlic will sometimes squeeze out. To me that's no biggie when it works well otherwise, just push it back in again as you go. Easy peasy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent and durable garlic press
reviews.reviewText: The Zulay garlic press set is great. It feels heavy, durable, and is overall well made. It also claims to have a lifetime warranty. I have only used it a couple times so far, but it does the job and is easy to clean!
I love this! It’s just as good (if not better) than a very expensive one that I had before it. The ergonomic handle is amazing. It’s easy to clean and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and easy to use, I have personally witnessed an 80 year old woman with bad hands effortlessly crushing an unpeeled garlic clove. Puree comes out, skin stays in the press.The clever prongs on the plate make sure that no garlic gets stuck in the press, roughly doubling the amount of puree that comes out if you're just doing one clove.I've tried it side by side with the (very good) industry-standard IKEA KONCIS press and this is much better in all ways.Other reviews mention a lack of durability. As new it seems solid as a rock, but I'll update this if it does break.
Massive Verarbeitung top Qualität sehr gute Handhabung
Funciona de maravilla. Vale la pena comprarlo. Nada que ver con la basura que venden en las tiendas chinas. Muy práctico.
